resources.string: Time to wait for device response
The longer the time, the more reliable will be the search (but also slower).\n\nCurrently: %1$s
After a search, refresh periodically the connection status of found devices and look for new ones
Show notification in notification area when new connection detected after a search
(Shows devices not currently but recently connected to your router)
You can check it in the Network settings of your device.\n Follow this link to know how:
The gateway is the device, part of your network, that connects you with Internet

This could be somebody you know or somebody you don\'t know.\n\nIf you don\'t recognize the hostname (or it\'s Unknown), you might check the IP on all your home devices (computers, mobiles, consoles…) to find out which one corresponds with this IP. Follow this link to know how:
In case you don\'t manage to find the device to which this IP belongs, you should check your router\'s security configuration
Configuring app for the first time
Please wait while the app is configured for the first time
Search finished\nRemember that you can assign a name by doing a long press on each device name
Do you want to delete all results?
Checking for new connections in background…
Not connected to any Wifi.\nYou must be connected to a Wifi to search.
A MAC address is needed to assign a name
